message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $9,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is still too low. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is a good compromise.  Let's see if we can reach a deal.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe $10,500 is still quite high. I would like to propose a price of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with our negotiations.
